subject: p16826047
History: Right pleural effusion with Pleurx catheter in place.
Findings: In comparison with study of, despite the right Pleurx catheter in place, there is still a substantial layering pleural effusion with compressive atelectasis at the right base. The left lung is essentially clear at this time. Continued enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with minimal if any vascular congestion. No acute focal pneumonia on the left.
